divs: Sighting DetailsWhile driving north on US 23 from his home in Fenton to his job in Flint MI. The witness is a Deputy Sheriff for Genesee County. He has been on the forcefor over 19 years. While driving he noticed 2 lights over the road. At first hethought it was a plane. He kept driving for about a mile or so, and he noticedthat whatever it was, it was not moving. He watched it and it still didnt move. He drove under it and passed it. At this time he was about 5 miles south ofBishop Airport. He looked in his rear view mirror and saw what looked likewindows at the back of it. It still was in the same place over the road. Hekept driving on his way to work, and lost sight of it. He says he wished hestopped to get a better look at what ever it was.
trends: There have been 40 other sightings in Flint
There were no other sightings in Flint on or around November 27th 1997
Summary: Deputy Sheriff sees anomalous lights near freeway
